summary: Eight housemates on a fake animated reality TV show realize they've been canceled and set off on a journey to get back on the air.
cast: Adam Carolla|Carol Channing|Randy Crenshaw|Christine Ebersole|Jess Harnell|Jon Joyce|Seth MacFarlane|Kelli O'Hara|Bobbi Page|Jack Plotnick|Chita Rivera|Eban Schletter|Tara Strong|Cree Summer|James Arnold Taylor|Vernon Wells|Kaitlyn Robrock
keywords: gross out comedy|shock humor|absurd comedy|bad taste humor|adult animation
title: The Drawn Together Movie: The Movie!
